N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 364.2 - Job descriptions

State Regulations

The employer of an applicant shall, upon request by the New

York State and Local Police and Fire Retirement System or the New York State
and Local Employees' Retirement System, provide a written statement which
accurately describes the duties of the applicant, as well as the physical or
psychological requirements of the position, as provided in section
364.3
of this Part. (The employer
shall not merely provide the official Civil Service job description for the
title of individuals whose duties and job requirements are not accurately
described in the official Civil Service job description). Notes
